alert.note: Alert for Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 09 at 4:21AM MST until November 09 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Light to moderate snow. New snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches. Accumulations of 2 to 4 inches around South Pass with lower amounts in the foothills above Lander and Ft. Washakie. Southwest wind gusting 25 to 35 mph. * WHERE...Wind River Mountains West and Wind River Mountains East. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Outdoor enthusiasts should expect the combination of snow and wind to make for difficult travel in the backcountry. The combination of snow and wind is likely to affect travel over South Pass after sunrise Wednesday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West
